duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, modify, deploy, and support custom mobile applications for iOS and Android using the Ionic platform.
Establish coding standards, code reviews, and architecture of the Mobile Application Development.
Support constituent-facing mobile and web applications to streamline client experience.
Perform benchmark testing, debugging, and documentation of programs, code, and data flow.
Implement top programming practices and standards to deliver quality products predictably and consistently.
Craft technical documentation of newly implemented features and bug fixes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science/Engineering or a related area
